author: Ben Kamisar
title: Pence says reopening economy critical to ensure 'cure isn't worse than the disease'
description: The vice president told "Meet the Press" that the country has sufficient testing capacity, governors in two hard-hit states ask for more.
content:
WASHINGTON Vice President Mike Pence said Sunday that the Trump administration wants to be sure that the coronavirus cure isnt worse than the disease as the White House takes steps to put America back to work as soon as we responsibly can.
